turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want a place to order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, is this for BElla Luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can hear myself in the background. Did you remember to put on headphones or earbuds?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: maybe turn down the volume, to help me hear you better.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I want to place a order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. For the first one, can I get pepperoni, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second pizza The second pizza just pineapple and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what about the 2nd on?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the third pizza, I want a chicken barbecue, please. All thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large think crust Pizza, the 1st Pepperoni, the 2nd, pineapple and cheese and the 3rd, chicken BBQ.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! the total for those will be $32.55.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. Bye. Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you. You, too. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.
